name: Frisee With Walnut Oil
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: frisée, grainy mustard, scallion, walnut oil
recipeIngredient: 4 heads frisee or 2 heads regular chicory (curly endive)
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: If using frisee, rinse it, dry it, remove the cores and tear into bite-sized pieces. If frisee is unavailable and you are substituting large heads of chicory, remove the green outer leaves and reserve them for another use. Use only the sweeter yellow and white leaves for the salad. Rinse and dry them and tear into bite-sized pieces. Place in the salad bowl and toss with the scallions.
Combine the vinegar and mustard and beat until blended. Add the oil and beat until the dressing is smooth. Pour over the salad, toss, season with salt and pepper, toss again and serve.
